snippet: Just because the Kings are dismal, and in Sacramento, is no reason to ignore the season DeMarcus Cousins is having.
abstract: Just because the Kings are dismal, and in Sacramento, is no reason to ignore the season DeMarcus Cousins is having.
lead_paragraph: Perhaps it's no surprise that the Sacramento Kings, at 9-15 (the second-worst mark in the Western Conference), lack for attention because few headlines are devoted to the struggles of a profoundly weird roster.

headline.main: Cousins's Talents Flying Under the Radar in Sacramento
